item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I am a Full Stack Developer from Pécs, Hungary. I work as a professional developer. I’m usually always seeking new challenges and the opportunity to learn something new. I’m currently spending my free time with blockchains, smart contracts, and NFTs. The purpose of this blog is to share my knowledge and my experience. If you want to contact me, feel free to do it through my socials which you can find above :)
item.content:
Hi!

I am a Full Stack Developer from Pécs, Hungary. I work as a professional developer. I’m usually always seeking new challenges and the opportunity to learn something new. I’m currently spending my free time with blockchains, smart contracts, and NFTs.

The purpose of this blog is to share my knowledge and my experience.

If you want to contact me, feel free to do it through my socials which you can find above :)

item.title: Hello World!
item.description: Hello World! I finnaly decided to setup my personal website where I can share stuff about programming and development! print("Hello World!") This is the first time I used HUGO for any kind of application, so far I’m linking it a lot. Hopefully, I can keep the site simple and lightweight :) Later down the line, there will be tutorials, and content targeted to people who want to learn programming or deep diver into specific topics.
item.content:
Hello World!

I finnaly decided to setup my personal website where I can share stuff about programming and development!

print("Hello World!")

This is the first time I used HUGO for any kind of application, so far I’m linking it a lot. Hopefully, I can keep the site simple and lightweight :)

Later down the line, there will be tutorials, and content targeted to people who want to learn programming or deep diver into specific topics.
